snippet: The decision to penalize JPMorgan for actions tied to the collapse of Lehman Brothers is the first federal enforcement case to stem from Lehman’s downfall.
abstract: The decision to penalize JPMorgan for actions tied to the collapse of Lehman Brothers is the first federal enforcement case to stem from Lehman’s downfall.

byline.original: By BEN PROTESS and AZAM AHMED

headline.main: Regulators Penalize JPMorgan Over Lehman Ties
headline.print_headline: U.S. Is Said To Penalize JPMorgan’s Lehman Ties
